attributes.action: introduce tougher sentences for people who carry knives and / or guns and commit crimes associated with them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This online petition will enable you to sign up and support the campaign for tougher sentences for people who carry knives and /or guns and commit crimes associated with them.  This kind of crime is becoming more and more common and is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
